article_title: Syrian army advancing inside Palmyra in major offensive: monitor
article_text:
The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said the fighting was the heaviest yet in the army's three-week campaign to recapture the desert city from Islamic State fighters.

It said Syrian soldiers and allied militias had taken control of neighborhoods in the western and northern parts of the city. Live television footage showed repeated explosions and smoke rising from many buildings.

Syrian state media earlier said the army had taken full control of Al-Amiriya district on the northern edge of Palmyra.

(Reporting by Dominic Evans; Editing by Mark Potter)

article_summary:
Syrian state media earlier said the army had taken full control of Al-Amiriya district on the northern edge of Palmyra.
It said Syrian soldiers and allied militias had taken control of neighborhoods in the western and northern parts of the city.
The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said the fighting was the heaviest yet in the army's three-week campaign to recapture the desert city from Islamic State fighters.
Live television footage showed repeated explosions and smoke rising from many buildings.
(Reporting by Dominic Evans; Editing by Mark Potter)
